name: Wood Harvest
description:
Welcome to experience the tree sawing experience!
There are islands with a plenty of trees. Explore around with your harvester to saw woods.

What you can do?
1. Explore around on the islands
2. Saw the trees in the forest with your truck
3. Harvest the woods and sell when back to base
4. Upgrade the saw and harvester to become more powerful
5. Speed up transport and capacity to boost your empire

A variety of islands are waiting for explore.
Upgrade your truck and keep moving on. Harvest the woods as much as possible.
The further you go, the better woods you can harvest.
